Package io.smudgr.app.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileDialog.FileDialogCallback
    The FileDialog.FileDialogCallback interface allows passing behavior for what to do when the file chooser is resolved, either from user cancellation or actual file selection.
    View
    The View interface defines methods for passing frames to a viewport at a configurable rate (frames per second).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileDialog
    The FileDialog singleton opens a native JFileChooser and passes a selected file or set of files to a given FileDialog.FileDialogCallback
    FileDialog.FileDialogFilter
    Instances of the FileDialog.FileDialogFilter class allows restricting selections to a specific file type for a FileDialog
    FullscreenView
    The FullscreenView creates a natively fullscreen Window on the specified monitor.
    MonitorView
    The MonitorView is for creating non-fullscreen windows to 'monitor' the application output.
    PiFullscreenView
    The PiFullscreenView implementation uses native Linux magic to efficiently flush pixels to the OS framebuffer.
    Window
    Instances of the Window class create an empty JFrame to flush pixels to efficiently.
